Author: yellowposy2
Text: First, just want to say that especially if you’ve been restricting you will not gain weight from eating these fries (even if you bloat from water weight). So go ahead, eat the fries. However, if that’s too scary something that helps me is throwing away a portion and serving myself a safer one- that way, you still get to enjoy them, but don’t feel sick after. Sending you love and support! You deserve to eat.
